Container.Name: sabnzbd-extended
Container.Overview: SABnzbd makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add an .nzb. SABnzbd takes over from there, where it will be automatically downloaded, verified, repaired, extracted and filed away with zero human interaction.[br] [br][br][b][span style='color: #E80000;']Scripts included:[/span][/u][/b][br] audio-pp.bash :: Script is used to automatically clean up downloaded audio files and convert to standardized format if desired[br] radarr-pp.bash :: Script is used to verify incoming video files for required audio/subtitle languages and also process the media with Sickbeard MP4 Automator if enabled[br] sonarr-pp.bash :: Script is used to verify incoming video files for required audio/subtitle languages and also process the media with Sickbeard MP4 Automator if enabled[br] [br][br][b][span style='color: #E80000;']Sickbeard MP4 Automater Configuration Files:[/span][/u][/b][br] Location: /config/scritps/configs[br] radarr-pp.ini[br] sonarr-pp.ini[br] For more detail, visit: https://github.com/mdhiggins/sickbeard_mp4_automator[br] [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Intel GPU Use[/span][/u][/b][br]Edit your [b]go[/b] file to include:[br][b]modprobe i915[br][/b], save and reboot, then [br]add [b]--device=/dev/dri[/b] to [b]"extra parameters"[/b] (switch on advanced view)
Container.Description: SABnzbd-Extended: This continer includes SABnzbd along with a set of post-processing scripts to enhance your SABnzbd usage

Config.Name: Auto Update SABnzbd Extended Scripts
Config.Description: TRUE = enabled :: Update scripts from git on container start

Config.Name: Auto Update Sickbeard MP4 Automator (SMA)
Config.Description: TRUE = enabled :: Update scripts from git on container start

Config.Name: Audio Post Processor: Target Format
Config.Description: FLAC or OPUS or MP3 or FDK-AAC or AAC or ALAC - converts lossless FLAC files to set format

Config.Name: Audio Post Processor: Target Format Bitrate
Config.Description: Set to desired bitrate when converting to OPUS/MP3/FDK-AAC/AAC format types

Config.Name: Audio Post Processor: Verify Downloaded Tracks
Config.Description: TRUE = ENABLED, Verifies FLAC/MP3 files for errors (fixes MP3's, deletes bad FLAC files)

Config.Name: Audio Post Processor: Detect Single File Albums
Config.Description: TRUE = ENABLED :: Detects single file albums and mark download as failed if detected

Config.Name: Audio Post Processor: Replaygain FLAC tagging
Config.Description: TRUE = ENABLED, adds replaygain tags for compatible players (FLAC ONLY)

Config.Name: Video Post Processor: Required Audio/Subtitle Language
Config.Description: Default: eng :: Set to required language (ISO 639-2 language code), if not found, will mark as failed

Config.Name: Video Post Processor: Encode with Sickbeard MP4 Automator (SMA)
Config.Description: TRUE = Enabled :: Uses SMA to process incoming video files, update your configuraiton at: /config/scripts/configs/(radarr/sonarr)-pp.ini
